1.0.name: wordpress/linkable-title-html-and-php-widget
1.0.description:
Using this wordpress plugin you may have Text, HTML, Javascript, Flash and/or Php as content in this widget with linkable/clickable widget titles, so this is a plus compared to the default wordpress' text widget.

NEW

  • Added Plugin Options Page (Settings -> Linkable Title Html and Php Widget ).
  • Added "Open the Title link/url in a new window" support.
  • Added "Title Text Color" support as Katie, Slips, Jim, Gary and John Herfindal request.
  • Added support to remove Text Content Div Tag if needed.

More plugins by PepLamb:

  • Google Analytics Visits
  • Custom Field Cookie
